description:
The Ultimate VI soft shell jacket is the updated version of one of our classics. It is suitable for almost all activities, thanks to a technical material combination of 3-layer Gore-Tex Infinium™
material, 4-way stretch and a lining with a 3D structure for breathability and optimum moisture-wicking. The Ultimate VI is an all-year-round jacket for outdoor activities and everyday wear.
name: Mammut Ultimate VI SO Jacket - Mens
